Interface AdministrationInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
LocationAdmin
public interface AdministrationInterface
Services for managing movies from the administrator's point of view.
Author:
Florent Delalande, Paul Hariel

  • Method Details

    • createArtist

      Artist createArtist(String lastName, String firstName, String nationality)
      Creates a new artist. There must not already be an artist with the same lastName and firstName.
      Parameters:
      lastName - the last name of the artist (non-empty string)
      firstName - the first name of the artist (empty string "" if the artist only has a last name and no first name)
      nationality - the nationality of the artist
      Returns:
      the created artist or null in case of error (invalid parameters or an artist with the same values already exists)

    • deleteArtist

      boolean deleteArtist(Artist artist)
      Deletes an artist from the set of artists. Cannot be done if the artist is associated with at least one movie as an actor or director.
      Parameters:
      artist - the artist to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • createMovie

      Movie createMovie(String title, Artist director, int year, int ageLimit)
      Creates a new movie. There must not already be a movie with the same title.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the movie (non-empty string)
      director - the director of the movie (non null)
      year - the year the movie was made
      ageLimit - the minimum age to watch the movie (0 if no age limit)
      Returns:
      the created movie or null in case of problem (a movie with the same title already exists or the parameters were not valid)

    • addActors

      boolean addActors(Movie movie, Artist... actors)
      Adds actors to a movie.
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie to modify
      actors - the list of actors to add. If actors from the list are already associated with the movie, they are not added again.
      Returns:
      true if at least one actor from the list was added to the movie's actors, false otherwise

    • addGenres

      boolean addGenres(Movie movie, Genre... genres)
      Adds genres to a movie.
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie to modify
      genres - the list of genres to add. If genres from the list are already associated with the movie, they are not added again.
      Returns:
      true if at least one genre from the list was added to the movie's genres, false otherwise

    • addPoster

      boolean addPoster(Movie movie, String file) throws IOException
      Adds a poster to a movie. If the movie already had a poster, it is replaced by the new one.
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie to which to add a poster
      file - the path of the file containing the poster image (in JPG, PNG format, etc.)
      Returns:
      true if the poster was modified (the format and size were valid)
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of file reading error

    • deleteMovie

      boolean deleteMovie(Movie movie)
      Deletes a movie from the set of movies.
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie to delete
      Returns:
      true if the movie was deleted or false in case of problem (the movie did not exist or the parameter was null)

    • getAllMovies

      Set<Movie> getAllMovies()
      Returns the set of movies.
      Returns:
      the set of movies

    • getAllActors

      Set<Artist> getAllActors()
      Returns the set of actors.
      Returns:
      the set of actors

    • getAllDirectors

      Set<Artist> getAllDirectors()
      Returns the set of directors.
      Returns:
      the set of directors

    • getMoviesByDirector

      Set<Movie> getMoviesByDirector(Artist director)
      Returns the set of movies by a director.
      Parameters:
      director - the director whose movies are wanted
      Returns:
      the set of movies by the director or null if none exist

    • getMoviesByActor

      Set<Movie> getMoviesByActor(Artist actor)
      Returns the set of movies by an actor.
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor whose movies are wanted
      Returns:
      the set of movies by the actor or null if none exist

    • getArtist

      Artist getArtist(String lastName, String firstName)
      Searches for an artist by their last name and first name.
      Parameters:
      lastName - the last name of the artist
      firstName - the first name of the artist
      Returns:
      the artist if found or null otherwise

    • getMovie

      Movie getMovie(String title)
      Searches for a movie by its title.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the movie
      Returns:
      the movie if found or null otherwise

    • openRental

      boolean openRental(Movie movie)
      Opens a movie for rental. Does nothing if the movie was already open for rental.
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie to open for rental
      Returns:
      true if the movie is open for rental, false in case of problem (the movie was not found or value null)

    • closeRental

      boolean closeRental(Movie movie)
      Closes the rental of a movie. Does nothing if the movie was not open for rental.
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie to close for rental
      Returns:
      true if the movie is closed for rental, false in case of problem (the movie was not found or value null)
